name: Snow Pile Simulator
description:
Play in the snow pile and find things. Show things to the Hot Water Bottle Fairy to unlock more things! And decorate a tree, too... 

*NOTE* The things are randomly generated, so you might have to play a little while to unlock certain features depending on your luck. 

CONTROLS 

RETURN - Return to Title screen 

P - Pause/Resume, opens Control Menu

LEFT/RIGHT ARROW KEYS - Move

UP ARROW KEY or UP AND RIGHT/LEFT ARROW KEYS - Jump

DOWN ARROW KEY - Fling snow when in snow pile

CTRL - Enter/Exit Fairy House and Ice Cave, reset snow pile (if not carrying an item)

SPACE - Advance dialogue when speaking to the Fairy

Use the mouse (hold down left button) or touchpad to drag and drop tree decorations when in the Fairy's house.

UNLOCKABLE CONTROLS (SPOILERS!!)

Z - THROW SNOWBALLS

X - BUILD SNOW THINGS

CTRL - RIDE CHAIRLIFT

SHIFT - SPREAD CRUMBS

S - TOGGLE ICE SKATES
